EmailTemplate.name: Pricing is out of politics - HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: The pricing of the opportunity {!Opportunity.Name} is out of politics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear user,
You are receiving this notification because the opportunity {!Opportunity.Name} has a pricing out of policy
To view the Opportunity record, please visit the following link: {!Opportunity.Link}
Thank you,
Digital Marketing - Engenium Capital
